channel.title: Comments on: Mizrachi Worker’s Party: Happy May Day
channel.description: notes on Jewish theology and spirituality

item.title: By: Alan Brill
item.dc:creator: Alan Brill
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://kavvanah.wordpress.com/2012/05/01/mizrachi-workers-party-for-may-day/#comment-4462">Eli Duker</a>.
no, but they shared one training camp and people crossed lines in the process of getting ready and then settling.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Eli Duker.

no, but they shared one training camp and people crossed lines in the process of getting ready and then settling.

item.title: By: Eli Duker
item.dc:creator: Eli Duker
item.description: According to this http://www.kfarnoar.org/pages/noar/zeire.php Ezra was part of BaHat, but was Tzeirei?
item.content:encoded: According to this http://www.kfarnoar.org/pages/noar/zeire.php Ezra was part of BaHat, but was Tzeirei?

item.title: By: yudel
item.dc:creator: yudel
item.description: Interesting seeing a Sefer Torah in Orthodox Jewish iconography. Today one would expect a sefer, no?
item.content:encoded: Interesting seeing a Sefer Torah in Orthodox Jewish iconography. Today one would expect a sefer, no?
